title: Jonas Software Acquires Huntington Business Systems (“HBS”)
content:
Brisbane, Queensland, Australia – November 27, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce on the 16th November 2022 it acquired Huntington Business Systems (“HBS”). HBS is a leading provider of Time and Attendance Management Software for small, medium, and large organizations across various industries.

HBS delivers a fully customizable cloud-based solution with the greatest performance and flexibility on the market today. The software can be tailored to meet the needs of complex payroll policies and other unique requirements to reduce organization costs and minimize risk.

“HBS is an excellent and welcomed addition to our Jonas family,” said Jeff McKee, CEO of Jonas Software ANZ. “We look forward to their fully scalable end-to-end software solutions ongoing growth across the region.”

Alison DeNicola, President and CEO of Huntington Business Systems, said, “We are delighted to become part of the Jonas family.

This acquisition provides HBS with an incredible opportunity to continue to expand our vision of handling complex payroll policies with customized solutions and superior customer support so that organizations can streamline and improve their payroll processes. We look forward to this next chapter and the opportunity to help our customers achieve their goals.”

Since its founding in 1992 HBS, and will continue to operate out of its headquarters based in Long Island, NY, servicing more than 1,500 clients across the United States, Canada and Europe.

The recent acquisition of HBS aligns with Jonas’s strategy to acquire and operate industry-specific software companies with a decentralized model. Having acquired over 130 companies, Jonas has long realized that its greatest asset is its employee base. Empowering its employees, who know the industry and products, translates into what is right for clients.

The HBS team has joined Jonas, and HBS will draw upon the added support and resources of the Jonas group. “Jonas has a buy-and-hold strategy,” says McKee. “We believe in retaining and growing the organizations we invest in over the long term.”

About Huntington Business Systems (HBS)

HBS has been operating as the leading Time and Attendance Management Software solution for over 25 years. The custom-built software solutions for clients range from 50 employees to more than 250,000 employees in several major industries. HBS’s software, Ecotime®, is designed to seamlessly integrate with an organization’s payroll, human resources, or accounting system.

About Jonas Software

Jonas Software operates over 130 independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. From its roots formed in the construction and club management markets, Jonas Software’s reach has grown extensively within the fitness, membership, hospitality, and industrial verticals. Today, Jonas Software is proud to supply industry-leading enterprise management software and related services to more than 80,000 customers in over 40+ vertical markets.

title: Vesta Software Group Acquires Qwantec Ingenieria Limitada (“Qwantec”)
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, United Kingdom – November 21, 2022 – Vesta Software Group (“Vesta”), a subsidiary of Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Qwantec, a market leading Chilean and Peruvian software provider of time & attendance control services and tools in the region.

This will be Vesta’s first acquisition in Chile & Peru and the fifth in LATAM. Qwantec was founded over 14 years ago and is dedicated to the provision of hardware and software in the areas of employee attendance and workforce management. Since its founding, Qwantec has focused on developing its solutions for its SME and Enterprise clients throughout Chile and Peru. The company has over 8,000 clients in the region.

“Qwantec has an incredible track record in their sector. They have been delivering high quality products to various industry verticals within Chile and Peru, to assist their clients in the complex task of recording time and attendance workforce data” said Richard Clancy, Group CEO at Vesta. “This acquisition will further strengthen Vesta’s mission to expand its buy and hold forever portfolio of high quality, mission critical vertical market software companies throughout South America.”

Oscar Granadino Horvath and Álvaro Vásquez Salinas, co-founders of Qwantec added “We are very happy with the trajectory and sustained growth of Qwantec which has now allowed us to be part of one of the largest technology groups in the United Kingdom and Canada, but without a doubt it is even better news for our more than 8,000 clients in Chile and Peru who will receive even better products and services in the future.”

About Qwantec

Qwantec is a market leading company in technological solutions for personnel management and attendance control in Chile and Peru. They have more than 14 years of experience optimizing the processes for more than 8,000 clients

About Vesta Software Group

Vesta Software Group operates over twenty independent software brands in a variety of vertical markets globally, enabling each to become clear leaders in their industry. As a subsidiary of Jonas Software, the group focuses on strengthening businesses within the markets in which it competes – whether through organic measures such as new initiatives or product development, day-to-day business, or growth through acquisition. Vesta Software Group’s ultimate parent company, Constellation Software Inc, is publicly traded in Canada (TSX: CSU) and is one of the largest owners and acquirers of vertical market software companies in the world.

About Jonas Software

Jonas Software operates over 125+ independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. From its roots formed in the construction and club management markets, Jonas Software’s reach has grown extensively within the fitness, membership, hospitality, and industrial verticals. Today, Jonas Software is proud to supply industry-leading enterprise management software and related services to more than 80,000 customers in over 40+ vertical markets.

title: Jonas Software Acquires VetlinkPRO

title: Vesta Software Group Acquires Datalogic Software
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, United Kingdom – November 2, 2022 – Vesta Software Group (“Vesta”), a subsidiary of Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Datalogic Software, a well-known provider of resource planning, human resources and payroll software solutions in Latin America.

This will be Vesta’s fourth acquisition in Uruguay alone. Datalogic was founded in 1987 and is dedicated to the provision of computer services in the areas of software development and technological outsourcing. Since its founding, Datalogic has focused on developing its ERP, Workforce Management and Payroll solutions for its SME and Enterprise clients throughout Latin America.

“Datalogic has an amazing heritage of delivering high quality products into the Uruguayan and surrounding markets, with systems running large government departments and private sector businesses,” said Richard Clancy, Group CEO at Vesta. “The Acquisition of Datalogic will further strengthen Vesta’s mission to be the premium owner of mission critical vertical market software companies throughout South America.”

Gustavo Charbonnier, Founder of Datalogic added “Uruguay is a global leader in digital transformation and the promotion of the software industry. While we are thankful and proud for all that we have accomplished in the past, now we are only thinking of the future for our customers and our people and have found in Vesta an ideal partner to continue driving Datalogic’s future growth and ambitions”.

About Datalogic Software

Datalogic Software has been providing its solutions and services in software development and technological outsourcing since 1987. The company’s comprehensive suite of products covers everything from ERP to human resources and payroll, offering modern and effective solutions for medium and large-sized companies.

About Jonas Software

Jonas Software operates over 120+ independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. title: Jonas Software Acquires Vizergy Digital Marketing
content:
Jacksonville, Florida, United States of America – September 19, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Vizergy Digital Marketing (“Vizergy”). Vizergy was founded in 1999 with the purpose of providing a hospitality focused Digital Sales & Marketing platform with a full suite of digital marketing services. Moving forward, Vizergy will continue to invest in its product ecosystem including their best of breed customer acquisition platform, hospitality focused digital marketing solutions, media deployment, and their award winning website and SEO competencies. Through the acquisition by Jonas Software, Vizergy clients can expect to see an accelerated pace of innovation, and the expansion of resources to become a global Digital Sales & Marketing service provider to the hospitality business.

 

 

“We are thrilled to have the Vizergy team join Jonas Software,” said Jim Fedigan, Group CEO at Jonas. “Vizergy is an incredible platform supported by a great team. They offer a unique set of products and skills that set them apart within the hospitality world and we are excited for the future growth of the business.”

 

 

Joe Hyman, Vizergy’s Founder and CEO states, “This is an incredibly exciting time for Vizergy.  We can fully leverage the new capabilities and investments by Jonas to serve our customers. The Vizergy Senior Leadership Team will remain the same and the company will continue to operate as a standalone brand.” Hyman continues, “Being part of the Jonas family presents unlimited opportunities for our clients and our team”.

 

 

Robert Arnold, Vizergy’s President, added, “We feel like Jonas Software perfectly aligns with the values, quality commitment and vision that has allowed Vizergy to grow and thrive for the past 20 years. We couldn’t be more excited about our future together”.

 

 

Thomas Patz, CEO of Belle Farm Capital Advisors, acted as the exclusive advisor to Vizergy.

 

 

About Vizergy® Digital Marketing

 

 

For nearly 25 years, Vizergy has served the hospitality industry with leading marketing technologies, knowledgeable talent, and leverage a data first approach to marketing for clients worldwide. The company deploys complete travel life-cycle marketing solutions from conversion-optimized website design to award-winning digital marketing programs, reservation solutions, media planning, and execution. Vizergy’s platform is easy to use, turnkey, and SMART — and is continually enhanced with tools to help hotels compete and maximize revenue. At Vizergy, hospitality marketing is not only the mission—it’s the sole focus. For more information, visit Vizergy.com.

 

 

About Jonas Software

 

 

Jonas Software operates over 120+ independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. From its roots formed in the construction and club management markets, Jonas Software’s reach has grown extensively within the fitness, membership, hospitality, and industrial verticals. Today, Jonas Software is proud to supply industry-leading enterprise management software and related services to more than 80,000 customers in over 40+ vertical markets.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Brainbase
content:
Markham, Ontario, Canada – September 16, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Brainbase. Brainbase provides brand licensing management software to global licensing businesses worldwide.

“The goal of Brainbase was to provide the best platform for brands that own and license their IP. With Jonas’ support and expertise in the licensing management space, we believe we can continue to improve the products and services we offer to our customers” said Nate Cavanaugh, CEO and Co-Founder. “We are excited to work with the team at Jonas to help owners of IP assets capture more value while saving time and effort.”

title: Jonas Software Acquires Uniworks Meat Processing Solutions
content:
Brisbane, Queensland, Australia – September 15, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Kevin McCarthy & Associates Limited (“McCarthys”).

McCarthys offer smart, innovative and adaptive IT service solutions, streamlining the management of core meat processing functions throughout Australasia. McCarthys is an exciting business and excellent team of individuals with an impressive product and industry reputation across the meat processing sector” said Jeff McKee, CEO Jonas Software ANZ.  “We are excited to welcome them to the Jonas family and look forward to collaborating closely to help McCarthys achieve ongoing growth across the region.   McCarthys’ diverse, proven and mission-critical meat processing software suite, and long-term customer relationships are an excellent complement to our portfolio of companies.”

About McCarthys

McCarthys’ Uniworks product provides industry specific software solutions that are fully customizable to meet  the high and complex demands of core meat processing functions. McCarthys was founded in the late 80s, as the sole supplier of software solutions in New Zealand throughout the modernization of the industry. Since then, McCarthys has continued to refine their products to enable the complete management of plant processing operations. The Uniworks solutions are designed to enhance product traceability and allows processors to stand behind their integrity and safety with confidence. From the farm gate to retailer, you can trust us McCarthys to support your business operations and growth.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Halo Leisure Enterprise Ltd.
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, United Kingdom – August 10, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Halo Leisure Enterprise Limited, a software subsidiary of Halo Leisure Services Ltd. The software company provides leading asset management software supporting businesses across Leisure and Hospitality.  Workflow Asset Management (WAM) is the product name and will remain the brand moving forwards.

“The Jonas team is excited to welcome WAM to our family of companies,” said Darrell Boxall, Group CEO at Jonas. “WAM is a fantastic addition to our portfolio for customers and markets we already serve. The solution has great potential and the team look forward to building on its success and continuing the growth of both of the markets it serves and the product.”

‘Halo Leisure is proud of the company it founded, building an asset management solution by operators for operators, and in turn servicing over one hundred leisure and hospitality operators. There is a lot of potential with the WAM product and after an extensive review we know Jonas Software will be the perfect new home for the solution and we are pleased to hand over the operations and management of WAM to Jonas Software, who we know, and trust will ensure it goes from strength to strength’ Scott Rolfe – Halo Leisure Services Limited.

About WAM

WAM software is an interactive solution for asset management, maintenance scheduling and defect reporting for organisations who acknowledge that assets are their business.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Infoscience Limited
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, United Kingdom – June 8, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of the Infoscience (Software) Limited (“Infoscience”). Infoscience is the leading supplier of auction software to the livestock market industry in the Republic of Ireland and further customers in Northern Ireland.  ICE Auctions, auction management software, is used throughout the customer base. 

“This acquisition provides expansion into an existing vertical for us” said Darrell Boxall, Group CEO. “While retaining the independence and localised feel of this well renown business, we feel the depth of sector knowledge within Infoscience supported by Jonas’ long-term vision and best practices makes for a winning formula.”

“ICE Auction’s acquisition by Jonas Software provides exciting opportunities for the development of the software and enhanced service to Marts across Ireland, while maintaining long standing relationships that have been key to our combined success.  Intuity look forward to partnering with Jonas to ensure the customer needs and expectations are paramount.” Gerard Cox, CEO, Intuity Technologies

About Infoscience

Infoscience works with auctioneers & livestock marketeers to provide a back-office software solutions called ICE Auctions since it was founded in 1987. ICE Auction is a fully integrated auction management system for the livestock mart industry. It has evolved over almost thirty years of change and development in the Irish Livestock market and has grown to become the preferred system among Irish Mart owners, which is why the majority of the Irish livestock industry use their software.

title: Jonas Software Acquires CompuMove Systems Corporation
content:
Markham, Ontario, Canada – March 31, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of CompuMove Systems Corporation (“CompuMove”). CompuMove is a comprehensive moving software that features fully integrated and customized move systems. It combines sales management, scheduling and dispatch, rating and form printing, storage and warehouse management, general ledger distribution and financial reporting (and much more) into a completely integrated and seamless moving system.

“We recognize CompuMove as a leading provider of moving software and management systems,” said Peyton Moore, Group Leader at Jonas. “We look forward to working closely with the team at CompuMove and continue to offer industry-leading moving software and solutions. Please join me in welcoming CompuMove and customers to the Jonas family.”

“We are very pleased to have found a permanent home at Jonas Software for CompuMove,” said Susanne Millian, President of CompuMove. “Jonas’ buy and hold forever strategy resonated with us and we are confident that our customers and employees are in good hands.”

Transworld Business Advisors, a world leader in the marketing and sales of businesses, mergers and acquisitions, and franchises, served as the sell-side advisor to CompuMove in the sale to Jonas Software. With further comment on the transaction, Marshall Pollock, Co-Owner of Transworld Business Advisors (San Diego North), states, “The acquisition is a very exciting development for CompuMove and the moving/storage industry as a whole. Jonas’ long-term approach and stability combined with CompuMove’s industry experience will drive the company to become industry leaders.”

About CompuMove Systems Corporation

CompuMove’s powerful move management software seamlessly brings together all of the different aspects of a moving company’s operation into one fully integrated system including a complete general ledger accounting system. CompuMove continues its leadership, providing leading-edge information management systems exclusively for the moving and storage industry.

About Jonas Software

title: medQ Inc. Acquisition Sharpens Jonas Software Focus on Healthcare
content:
Brisbane, Queensland, Australia – March 31, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of medQ Inc. (“medQ”).

medQ is an industry leader in providing Diagnostic Imaging workflow solutions that enable Clinicians and Radiologists to deliver high quality and cost-effective patient care. “Their reputation for providing tailored workflow solutions, rapid solution implementation and industry leading customer support to the Diagnostic Imaging market is what drew us to medQ” said Jeff McKee, Group CEO. “Complementing our existing Healthcare businesses, medQ brings a long history of working closely with their Healthcare customers to deliver innovative and tailored solutions.”

About medQ Inc.

medQ was founded in 1996 and has built an enviable industry reputation providing tailored solutions for our Diagnostic Imaging customers’ specific needs. “We thrive on understanding each of our customers’ unique challenges, and then working with them to deliver an integrated solution that enables them to provide high quality and cost-effective patient care”, says John Norman, CEO of medQ.

medQ provides highly configurable and customizable imaging workflow software, providing imaging practices with automated front office, technologist, and radiology reporting workflow solutions for more than 25 years. Today, medQ provides hundreds of imaging teams with custom, automated workflows that fit their exact clinical needs, and have a positive impact on patient care.

title: Jonas Software Acquires LilYPad POS
content:
Markham, Ontario, Canada – March 21, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of LilYPad POS (“LilYPad”). LilYPad provides web-based, party booking, and point of sale software to family entertainment centers including trampoline parks, indoor play gyms, laser tag, roller rinks, etc.

“LilYPad POS is an affordable and easy to use Business Management System designed for owners, managers, front-of-house staff and customers”, said Arthur Morris, CEO of the Jonas Fitness & Leisure portfolio. “This growing business is a great addition to our existing group and we are looking forward to working closely with the LilYPad team to help them drive even more value to their customers.”

“The creation of LilYPad POS was to provide family entertainment centers with a simple POS system that businesses can rely on. LilYPad provides efficient customer service while providing ease of use to customers when charging for goods and services, booking groups, providing waivers, and more” said Jeremy DeValk, CEO and Founder. “We are eager to begin working with the team at Jonas and excited to join their vast family of software companies.”

About LilYPad POS

Founded in 2010, LilYPad provides a web-based point of sale software to family entertainment centers (FEC). It is a rich POS system that is simple and easy to use, yet provides all features and access to the information required to efficiently run an FEC. Some features include sales processing, event management, customer and membership management, online booking, electronic ticketing, employee management, etc.

title: Jonas Software Acquires RBRO Solutions Inc. to Expand Global Legal iManage Functional Practice
content:
Markham, Ontario, Canada – March 1, 2022 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of RBRO Solutions Inc. (“RBRO”). A leading web-based document and email management provider for the legal and financial industries, RBRO delivers secure, compliant cloud and IT solutions focused on legal and professional services. Jonas is an operating group of Constellation Software, Inc. (CSI), a public company listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (CSU.TO).

“We’re very excited to acquire RBRO, a leading provider of document and email management in the legal vertical,” said Don Decker, Group Leader at Jonas. “We look forward to working closely with RBRO to continue empowering customers through leading-edge solutions and services. Please join me in welcoming the RBRO team and customers to the Jonas family.”

“It is an exciting time for the RBRO team to be part of an entity such as Jonas that has previously demonstrated and contributed to the success of many businesses before us,” said Howard Russell, CEO of RBRO. “We are excited to leverage Jonas’ best practices to further expand our services and solutions to our customers. Our vision to become a trusted solutions provider for the professional services industry drives us to excel and to enable our clients to better connect and collaborate. By joining Jonas Software, we continue to accelerate those goals.”

“Change and growth is critical in all aspect of life and I could not think of better hands than those of Jonas to place RBRO in, for that continued metamorphosis”, says John Russell, former owner and co-founder of RBRO Solutions. “Our customers will be a key beneficiary of the new RBRO.”

Generational Equity, a leading mergers and acquisitions advisor for privately-held businesses, served as the sell-side advisor to RBRO in the sale to Jonas Software.

About RBRO Solutions Inc.

A leading web-based document and email management provider for the legal and financial industries, RBRO serves professional firms looking for secure file collaboration, knowledge management, and information governance solutions. RBRO was founded in 2003 and is a premier iManage partner that provides full-stack solutions ranging from consulting services and iManage integration functionality.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Lean Industries
content:
Markham, Ontario, December 23, 2021 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Lean Industries (“Lean”). Lean was founded in 2005 with the purpose of delivering solutions for disputed consumer-originated financial transactions, in both the card and non-card payments space, for both fraud and non-fraud disputes. Since its founding, Lean has developed two core products. AdjustmentHub is a dispute case management software providing customers with pre-built functionality and standardized workflow interfaces to streamline and manage disputed transactions. NetworkHub is a Patent pending system providing standardized interfaces with payment networks, such as Mastercard and VISA, to orchestrate the dispute management process.

“We are thrilled to have the Lean team join Jonas Software,” said Jim Fedigan, Group CEO at Jonas. “Lean is a market leader in dispute management and we are excited for the future growth opportunities with the business.”

“We are delighted to become part of Jonas Software” said Dave Noah, CEO of Lean Industries. “It is exciting to be able to leverage Jonas’ proven best practices for software companies in order to expand our product and service offerings. Following years of searching for the right-fit-partner, we are excited to become part of Jonas Software. We will remain Lean Industries in all of our strengths and now be able to leverage Jonas’ proven best practices for software companies to fortify our operations and customer deliveries for even higher quality and expansions across our product and service offerings.”

Jim Schlegel, President of Lean Industries added, “For almost 20 years, Lean Industries has been successfully serving the financial services industry with our disputed payments technology and expertise.  Becoming part of Jonas Software marks a new chapter in our journey, and it will be one where we continue to build on the foundations of client-centricity, innovation and agility that make Lean Industries exceptional.”

About Lean Industries

Lean Industries is focused exclusively on delivering solutions for disputed consumer-originated financial transactions, in both the card and non-card payments space, for both fraud and non-fraud disputes. Lean provides their AdjustmentHub and NetworkHub software products and implementation services to large financial services companies across the United States and Europe, with dispute resolution workflows spanning debit, credit, and prepaid card payment transactions. Their software products result in a highly efficient and automated back office operational structure, with commensurate cost savings and productivity improvements.

About Jonas Software

Jonas Software operates over 110 independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. title: Jonas Software Reaches Agreement with Capita plc to Purchase AMT Sybex
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, December 24, 2021 – Jonas Computing (UK) Limited, part of Jonas Software (“Jonas”), has agreed to acquire AMT Sybex from Capita plc (“Capita”).

AMT Sybex is the leading provider of critical utilities and infrastructure software in the UK. Its software facilitates efficient and reliable energy provision by balancing supply and demand.

“The Jonas team is excited to welcome AMT Sybex into our portfolio,” said Scott Saklad, Group CEO at Jonas. “AMT Sybex has a long and sustained track record in its respective industries, and we look forward to enhancing and strengthening these client relationships long term.”

Jon Lewis, Capita’s Chief Executive Officer, said: “We are pleased to have agreed the sale of our AMT Sybex business to Jonas following a competitive sale process. As we continue to simplify and strengthen the business, this disposal is another step towards a more focused and sustainable Capita for the long term. At the same time, our AMT Sybex colleagues and clients will join an established industry organisation with plans to take the business onto the next stage of its development.”

About Capita

Capita is a consulting, transformation and digital services business. Every day our 55,000 colleagues help millions of people, by delivering innovative solutions to transform and simplify the connections between government and citizens, businesses and customers. We partner with our clients and provide the insight and cutting-edge technologies that give time back, allowing them to focus on what they do best and making people’s lives easier and simpler. We operate across three divisions – Capita Public Service, Capita Experience and Capita Portfolio – in the UK, Europe, India and South Africa. Capita is quoted on the London Stock Exchange (CPI.L). Further information can be found at: http://www.capita.com

About AMT Sybex

AMT Sybex is the leading provider of critical utilities and infrastructure software in the UK. Clients rely on its software for the daily operation of the country’s utilities market, facilitating the balance of demand and supply and ensuring the markets run efficiently and reliably. AMT Sybex’s software is used to manage data flows for more than 35 million electricity and gas meter points, with around two million records processed per day.

About Jonas Computing (UK) Limited

Jonas Computing (UK) Limited is part of the Jonas Software operating group, which contains a diverse collective of over 100 independently managed software companies around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders within their respective markets.

title: Vesta Software Group, a subsidiary of Jonas Software, Announces Acquisition of GeneXus Consulting (GXC S.A.) & K2B (Magalink S.A.)
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, October 11, 2021 – Vesta Software Group (“Vesta”), a subsidiary of Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of GeneXus Consulting (GXC S.A.) & K2B (Magalink S.A.), being Jonas’ first acquisition in South America. GeneXus Consulting was founded in 1992 with the purpose of assisting organizations to achieve their business objectives through the proper use and implementation of GeneXus technology. Since its founding, GeneXus Consulting has developed projects for large organizations in private and public sectors, in countries such as Uruguay, Paraguay, Argentina, Chile, Panama, Mexico, and the United States, among others. K2B offers Government & Private Sector ERP solutions, allowing every organization and industry to automate the administrative, accounting, budgeting and financial management of the organization. Its platform facilitates and integrates administrative processes, activating and controlling all internal and external operations of the organization.

“K2B has done an excellent job of penetrating the Uruguayan and surrounding markets with systems running large government departments and private sector businesses,” said Richard Clancy, Portfolio Manager at Vesta. “GeneXus Consulting is extremely strong in delivering bespoke Government projects over the last 29 years. We’re excited to work with both teams in delivering new initiatives and continuing to be market leaders in Uruguay.”

“GeneXus Consulting and K2B have played an important role in this digital transformation leadership by developing innovating world class products such as GRP, ERP, Cattle industry traceability, and public health solutions among others,” said Karina Santo, Founder of Genexus Consulting & K2B. “Uruguay is one of the global leaders in government digital transformation due to its focus in the promotion of the software industry. We look forward to working with Jonas to continue to expand our product and service offerings throughout the rest of Uruguay and beyond.”

About GeneXus Consulting (GXC S.A.) & K2B (Magalink S.A.)

GeneXus Consulting is the company that provides services to assist organizations achieve their business objectives through the proper use and implementation of GeneXus technology. K2B is a Government & Private Sector ERP solution, allowing every organization and industry to automate the administrative, accounting, budgeting and financial management of the organization from an integral vision. K2B is comprised of ERP/Government Resource Planning systems running large government departments and Private sector businesses.

title: Jonas Software Announces Acquisition of Newline ASP
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, September 7, 2021 – Jonas Software  (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of the Newline ASP partnership (Newline). Newline is the leading supplier of auction software to the livestock market industry in the UK, Ireland, New Zealand, and North America.  The auction management software is used in virtually every type of auction; saleroom, auction house, plant & machinery, and commercial auctions.  “This acquisition provides the start of an exciting new vertical for us,” said Darrell Boxall, Portfolio Manager. “While retaining the independence and family feel of this well-renowned business, we feel the depth of sector knowledge within Newline supported by Jonas’ long-term vision and best practices makes for a winning formula.” 

“Newline was founded in 1983 by my father, David Jones, and specialized in the writing of auction software for livestock auctioneers. Both myself and my brother Simon joined the family business and after working through many roles became managing partners.  We are excited for our customers, staff & ourselves about the journey ahead with Jonas and are looking forward to learning from a global organisation and how to build upon our successes to date.”, stated PC Jones, as former managing partner and newly appointed Managing Director of Newline. 

About Newline ASP

Newline ASP works with auctioneers, chartered surveyors, estate agents & livestock marketeers in both hemispheres and has provided back-office software solutions since 1983. A second-generation firm with family values at its core; Newline ASP blends continual R&D with best in class support. In excess of 150 auction firms (that’s more than 200 auction centres) use the software, including over 85% of UK livestock markets, almost 50% of marts in Ireland, 90% of Sale Yards in New Zealand & in leading markets in Canada.

Today, Jonas Software is proud to supply industry-leading enterprise management software and related services to more than 80,000 customers in over 30+ vertical markets.

WM-data’s key product, FAGUS Paper, specializes in manufacturing execution systems, planning, scheduling and trim optimization software for the paper manufacturing industry.

“This acquisition will allow for development resources and experienced personnel to add to our growing Manufacturing vertical,” said Richard Clancy, Portfolio Manager. “We are excited about the quality of the people and the clients of WM-data.  What WM-data has accomplished over the past 30 years is tremendous and we hope to build upon their accomplishments within Germany.”

“WM-data was founded in 1991 by developing practical experience in programming solutions for the paper industry. Our long-term goal has always been to increase our customers’ value creation in a sustainable and efficient way. With the acquisition of WM-data, our customers will continue to work with a preferred partner in the paper industry, with the financial backing and best practices from Jonas’ independently managed software companies.”, says Heinz Schmitz, Founder.

About WM-data Deutschland GmbH

In 1991 WM-data Deutschland GmbH was found from IT department of Feldmühle AG during some outsourcings. Looking back on more than 30 years of practical experience in programming solutions for the paper industry, WM-data has excellent know-how in processes, analysis and development. title: Jonas Software Announces Acquisition of Dynamiq Pty Ltd.
content:
South Brisbane, April 30, 2021 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Dynamiq Pty Ltd (“Dynamiq”). Businesses today are faced with a multitude of threats to their people, operations and reputation, from natural disasters, workplace accidents, disgruntled employees, industrial espionage to cyber-attack, supply chain issues and global instability. Organizations choose to work with Dynamiq to access expert support and advice in Crisis and Emergency Management, Business Continuity Planning, Strategic Security and Emergency Response Planning.

“We continue to be impressed with the product and market vision of Dynamiq,” said Jeff McKee, Group CEO. “We believe they are a great addition to the Jonas family, providing peace of mind for employees, management and investors from multinational companies to small and medium-sized businesses.”

“Dynamiq was founded in 2005 with a mission to help businesses become more resilient. The services we provide either prepare your people to respond during an incident or enable them to resume operations in the shortest possible time and then seize opportunities”, says Jarrod Wilson, CEO of Dynamiq. “Whether it is an extreme weather event or a worldwide pandemic, organizations need to be better prepared. We feel with Jonas’ long-term approach and organizational assets, Dynamiq will continue to enhance and strengthen our client relationships long-term.”

About Dynamiq Pty Ltd.

Founded in 2005, Dynamiq is an industry leader in creating a safe and resilient world. The experience, insights, and quality services provided ensure that our clients are prepared for any interruptions and crises the business may face. Dynamiq services help businesses improve their preparedness to respond to business interruptions and overcome the challenges these interruptions present. Organizations choose to work with Dynamiq to access expert support and advice in Crisis and Emergency Management, Business Continuity Planning, Strategic Security and Emergency Response Planning – all underpinned by the fast, effective, and secure Business Resilience Communication Solution, EMQnet.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Omniterm Data Technology Ltd.
content:
Markham, Ontario, April 6, 2021 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Omniterm Data Technology Ltd. Omniterm delivers a complete and affordable theatre management solution that includes ticket sales, reserved seating, concessions, promotion, loyalty programs, restaurant sales and business reporting. Omniterm’s software suite is available for mid-to-large size cinemas and cinema chains.

“We are pleased to welcome Omniterm to our team, with their focus on producing innovative hardware and software solutions for the entertainment industry for over 40 years, seating millions of moviegoers,” said Jeff McKee, Group CEO Jonas Software Australia.

Ed Coman, Founder of Omniterm, says “This acquisition provides an opportunity for Omniterm to gain financial strength, share best practices and contribute to the continued success for our loyal customers. We are very excited to become a part of the Jonas portfolio and for our executive team to lead Omniterm into its next chapter”.

About Omniterm Data Technology Ltd.

Omniterm has been the pioneer in the North American theatre industry in creating a POS system solution for multiplex theatres, starting with Cineplex’s first multiplex theatre at the Toronto Eaton Centre in the 1970’s.  Today it continues to develop and produce innovative hardware and software solutions for the entertainment industry and serves 1000s of screens around the world. Omniterm’s engineering-driven approach to the business delivers an astoundingly stable, user-friendly POS and online platform with robust reporting and data insights to cinema owners and managers.

title: Jonas Software Enters New Geography with Acquisition of Easit AB
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, February 26, 2021 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Easit AB (“Easit”), its first acquisition in Sweden. Easit provides case management, data management software, and highly skilled consulting services to businesses in both the private and public sectors. Easit GO, automates business processes and workflows as an efficient and modern Enterprise  Service Management solution, while ETE provides easy-to-use Data Management solutions using a completely new mindset.

“This is a very exciting transaction for the Case and Data Management sectors, with Easit being a recognizable leader in Sweden. The transaction adds a highly skilled professional services team to our group, making this a strategic investment for us in the Nordic region,” said Group CEO Scott Saklad. “We are looking forward to working with Easit’s talented team and strong customer base and will be looking to further grow our footprint in Sweden.”

CEO Fredrik Persson says, “I am delighted to have secured the sale of the business to Jonas. Their long-term vision and ‘hold forever’ strategy resonates with us and is a great fit for our customers and employees. Our flagship products have matured with over 20 years of industry experience, together with our highly skilled consulting teams who can continue growing in new locations.  Jonas will make a great home for Easit as they continue to expand their presence in our business areas around Europe.”

About Easit AB

Easit AB is a Swedish software company that provides case management, data management software and consulting services to businesses in both the private and public sectors.

title: Jonas Software Acquires RewardOps
content:
Markham, Ontario, November 16, 2020 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce its 100th acquisition with the addition of RewardOps, an engagement commerce platform creating positive disruption in the loyalty space. RewardOps’ API-based software enables forward-thinking companies in the loyalty industry to easily build, track and streamline their rewards programs. This acquisition also marked our first milestone in entering the loyalty vertical.

Through one simple integration, customers can access millions of products from a continuously growing marketplace of exciting reward suppliers for new and deepening levels of engagement. Customers who leverage its trailblazing technology are global leaders in the financial, travel and retail verticals.

“We’re pleased to welcome RewardOps to the team, a recognizable leader in the loyalty vertical,” says Matt Otchet, Group CEO at Jonas. “RewardOps has grown significantly in recent years and has become a sophisticated solution for managing suppliers, points earn, redemptions, logistics, and accounting.  Please join me in welcoming the RewardOps team and customers to the Jonas family.”

“As experts in building successful vertical market B2B SaaS companies, Jonas is the ideal partner to accelerate our innovation and supercharge our growth,” said Azim Esmail, CEO, Founder of RewardOps. “We could not be more excited to begin this journey with Jonas, and we are eager to learn from their successes and best practices. Moreover, Jonas’ decentralized nature and buy-and-hold mantra ensure that we will retain the culture that has defined us over the years and provide an excellent home for our customers and employees. Jonas truly resonates with our core values, dedicated to building for the future and embracing change. We look forward to working with them to build upon our success and redefining the Rewards Industry’s future.”

title: Jonas Software Acquires InfoMax Technologies
content:
Markham, Ontario, October 8, 2020 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of InfoMax Technologies (“InfoMax”). InfoMax provides a business process & workflow automation solution platform with user-friendly data capturing modules with web forms on tablet computers and digital pen & paper technology. Infomax is an industry leader focused on the Canadian long-term care industry, as well as the Canadian municipal government sector. The InfoMax solutions help facilitate easy and accurate data capturing, transmission and processing for form-based data such as prescriber’s orders, medication administration records from doctors and nurses to long-term care pharmacies, and utility locate data and dozens of other forms used for municipal governments.

Ambrose Au, President & Co-founder, had this to say, “The acquisition of InfoMax brings an emphasis on growth that will enhance our ability to deliver business process and data capturing with digital pen & paper technology and tablet web forms for our clients. We’re excited to realize the opportunities that are possible with Jonas’ resources and experience within the industry. We also believe Jonas will be a great long-term home for our dedicated employees and loyal customers.”

“We are delighted to have joined Jonas Software.” said Ben Leung, Vice President & Co-founder.  “Jonas has a strong portfolio across many industries, and I’m delighted to see InfoMax taking its place among them as they continue to expand their presence in the long-term care and other verticals. We look forward to working with the team at Jonas to continue to build upon our success and our products in order to better serve our customers.”

“InfoMax has a long and sustained track record of delivering excellent client service and we are looking forward to working with their talented team” explained Susan Lyle, Group Leader at the Jonas Group. “Over the years they have done a tremendous job of focusing on the customer needs from a product and service perspective.”

About InfoMax Technologies

InfoMax has developed a robust and proprietary business process & workflow automation solution platform, to facilitate the use of Anoto digital pen & paper technology and web forms on a tablet. These solutions have been sold to pharmacies within the Canadian long-term care sector and Canadian municipal government.

For over 22 years, InfoMax has been helping long term care homes and their supporting pharmacies to achieve greater efficiencies, accuracy and reliability enabling the front-line professionals to spend less time on dealing with technology and more focus on resident care, while streamlining the pharmacy operation.

title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of Ineo, LLC
content:
Markham, Ontario, September 3, 2020 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Ineo, LLC (“Ineo”). Ineo offers comprehensive global mobility management software, outsourced mobility financial management, and specialized mobility tax services to Relocation Management Companies (RMCs) and Corporations. Ineo represents Jonas’ first acquisition in the Corporate Mobility vertical.

Ineo offers full lifecycle assignment management and integrates every aspect of the mobility workflow – from vendor management to global compensation services. Leveraging Ineo’s global tax knowledge, it integrates data entry and reporting with logic to support the complexities of mobility talent management.

“We are very excited to acquire Ineo, a recognizable leader in the corporate mobility software vertical,” says Matt Otchet, Group CEO at Jonas. “Ineo has done a remarkable job in growing into the success it is today, and we look forward to collaborating with the Ineo team to further build upon that foundation.  Please join me in welcoming the Ineo team and customers to the Jonas family.”

“Ineo has always been the industry’s most trusted mobility technology and tax resource,” said David Santora, CEO of Ineo Mobility. Now we are starting a new journey as part of Jonas where we will have access to other like-minded businesses to learn from and share best practices. Moreover we have the unique opportunity to run the business autonomously enabling us to stay on course with our goal of being the world’s foremost provider of Mobility technology. Jonas truly understands the dynamic needs of our customers, the industry and our team  We look forward to working with them to build upon our success.”

“This is a very exciting and impactful transaction for the mobility software sector.  It brings together the strategic strength of Jonas with the product technology expertise of Ineo to become a leader driving the evolution of mobile workforce management,” said Chris Headrick, Managing Director, Technology M&A at KeyBanc Capital Markets Inc. With further comment on the transaction, Dev Navare, Managing Director, HR Tech and Services at KeyBanc Capital Markets Inc. states, with Ineo’s fundamental understanding of the need to bring forth leading technology the adoption of mobility software will accelerate to allow companies of all sizes to better manage their distributed workforces.”

KeyBanc Capital Markets Inc. acted as an exclusive financial advisor to Ineo Global Mobility Knowledge.

About Ineo

Founded in 2003, Ineo is the global mobility industry’s premier technology, tax, and financial services company and the industry’s most trusted knowledge source. Ineo Mobility was the first to bring deep tax and technology expertise to the business of Mobility services. Today, they continue to lead the increasingly complex industry with customized solutions to meet each client’s specific challenges.

About KeyBanc Capital Markets Inc.

KeyBanc Capital Markets Inc. is a leading corporate and investment bank providing capital markets and advisory solutions to dynamic companies capitalizing on opportunities in changing industries. Our deep Technology industry expertise, advisory capabilities and unique ideas are seamlessly delivered to companies across the Software, IT Services and Infrastructure sectors.  KeyBanc’s HR Tech practice has a strong track record of successfully advising companies with over 15 M&A transactions and over 25 Capital Markets transactions completed within the last several years.

title: Jonas Software Acquires the Intellectual Property of QuickQube
content:
Markham, Ontario, February 13, 2020 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of the intellectual property of QuickQube from Solutions On The Go, LLC.

“We are very excited to continue to invest in the moving and storage industry as this is our third acquisition in the past few years,” explains Peyton Moore, President at EWS Group “Solutions On The Go has been a market leader and successful software company in the moving and storage industry. We are pleased to be able to acquire the QuickQube product, which will complement our existing offerings and drive even greater value to our collective office and industrial moving clients. We are pleased to welcome them to the Jonas family.”

Co-Founder and VP Dave Dunlap said, “Jonas Software brings industry expertise with an emphasis on growth that will enhance our ability to deliver automated solutions for our clients and their customers. We’re excited to realize the opportunities that are possible with Jonas’ resources and experience within the industry.”

Co-Founder and President Hari Dudani said, “QuickQube is the product of our industry experience from over 15 years in the O & I moving industry. We’re looking forward to seeing the growth with QuickQube and Jonas over the next few years.”
 

About Solutions On The Go

QuickQube is an automated sales process system designed for office and industrial moving salesperson. The program collects, calculates, stores, and manages all the information needed to generate a commercial move estimate, proposal, move plan and work orders. QuickQube will eliminate costly math errors, increase your closing ratio, and give you more time to spend prospecting for new clients and nurturing your existing clients.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Club Caddie Inc.
content:
Markham, Ontario, February 10, 2020 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Club Caddie Inc. Headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, Club Caddie offers an award-winning, cloud-based, golf management software built by industry professionals.

Jim Fedigan, Group CEO, said he is very excited for Club Caddie to become part of the Jonas portfolio. “Club Caddie is a great addition to Jonas, and we are thrilled to welcome this strong team into our family of companies.

Club Caddie is a platform that’s been in development for over 5 years and we have been really impressed with both the breadth and depth of the platform and the opportunity it represents to expand our portfolio in the public and MCO golf markets.”

Founder of Club Caddie, Jason Pearsall, had this to say, “Joining the Jonas family will provide Club Caddie with the resources and experience to become a world-class software provider.  With our deep industry knowledge and product/development expertise, I’m confident that Club Caddie will continue to grow in conjunction with new ownership. The acquisition will allow us to keep doing what we love, while under guidance from a vertical-based software giant. I believe that there will be a lot of opportunities to expand even further into this vertical.”
Club Caddie is a comprehensive software suite that is equipped to handle the needs of any golf course operation. 

About Club Caddie Inc.

Club Caddie was founded by enterprising Golf Course operators as an answer to their needs to manage all of the challenges of running profitable golf operations in today’s market.  Based in Detroit Michigan- with over 5 years of experience serving golf clubs across the United States they offer an All-in-One, cloud-based SaaS software product. Club Caddie’s comprehensive core system allows users to manage all aspects of their properties from golf operations with integrated Point-of-sale, Tee-Sheet and food/beverage operations. With customers in over 10 states and a growing number of courses under contract every day,  Club Caddie’s award-winning technology is well-positioned to help golf course operators run a better business.

title: Jonas Software Acquires ProviderSoft LLC
content:
Markham, Ontario, November 22, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of ProviderSoft LLC. Headquartered in Lumberton, New Jersey, ProviderSoft products deliver critical tools to manage operations of Early Intervention, Preschool (CPSE), and Behavioural Service agency operations.

Arthur Morris, Group CEO, said “The acquisition of ProviderSoft was a tremendous opportunity to enter the childhood development vertical, which straddles healthcare and education.  With changes in regulatory requirements and increasing reliance on electronic medical records across all sectors of healthcare, ProviderSoft is well-positioned for significant growth.  We plan to be there every step of the way to support the ProviderSoft team as we grow and deepen our presence within the vertical”.

ProviderSoft was founded by Mark Shaw who initially ran an agency providing Early Intervention Services.  After successfully exiting that business, he realized that there was limited commercially available software to help manage these agencies and set out to develop his own.  Under Mark’s ownership in partnership with Miles Technologies, and the operational control of Co-CEOs Tony Quarella and Alicyn Harkness, they have grown both the product and the company to support agencies throughout the United States.  Mark Shaw had this to say, “Jonas provides the team at ProviderSoft the means and stability to develop the product whilst expanding the business to new customers and new geographies.  Tony, Alicyn, and the rest of the team are really looking forward to working with the professionals at Jonas to reach new horizons.”

About ProviderSoft LLC

ProviderSoft is a New Jersey-based company with over 10 years of experience serving childhood development agencies and providers across the United States by helping them operate efficiently and effectively. ProviderSoft’s comprehensive core system allows users to monitor all aspects of their business ensuring regulatory compliance, securely maintaining patient data, ensuring proper billing/reimbursements, and optimizing provider utilization.  ProviderSoft delivers its products in a cloud-based Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model, requiring minimal technology infrastructure for the agency while allowing individual providers to interact with systems in a geographically flexible manner, in family homes, at schools, or wherever their work needs dictate.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Impos Solutions International Pty Ltd.
content:
South Brisbane, November 12, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Impos Solutions International Pty Ltd. Headquartered in Melbourne, Australia, Impos is best known for being a leading provider of integrated POS Solutions to the Australian Hospitality industry. The past few years have seen substantial growth with the extension to schools, corporate enterprises and government bodies, providing customised solutions and becoming a market leader in providing consultative services to a broader range of clients.

Jeff McKee, Jonas Software Australia CEO, said he was delighted to announce the acquisition. “We’re excited to welcome Impos into our growing portfolio of companies in Australia. Impos has a long and sustained track record of being a recognisable leader in the Australian Hospitality sector, and we’re looking forward to working with their talented team.”

Impos founder, Sean O’Meara, said “Jonas Software has a strong portfolio of market leaders across many industries, and I’m delighted to see Impos taking its place amongst them. This outcome has come to fruition after more than 12 months of collaboration as it was very important to me it felt like the right fit. In the hands of Jonas, there will be an increased focus on product and development with many great new and exciting opportunities ahead for the team and business.”

This year has seen exciting growth including the coveted appointment of Impos CEO, Andrew Paynter working out of the Impos HQ building in St Kilda Road, Melbourne. The leadership team will remain unchanged with Andrew bringing over twenty years of industry experience in high-performance business operations, sales leadership, information technology, management consulting, and software development. 

About Impos Solutions

Impos Solutions International Pty Ltd has been developing point of sale systems since October 2005. Founder Sean O’Meara identified the need for a fast, robust and powerful POS system that initially addressed the needs of the fast-growing nightclub scene. In the past decade, Melbourne-based Impos has grown to become the leading POS provider to the Australian hospitality industry. Impos is currently installed in more than 2,700 hospitality venues across Australia, New Zealand and the Pacific Islands. With offices in all major Australian capital cities, Impos has a dedicated team of professionals helping venues thrive. Twenty-three of Australia’s Top 100 Restaurants, 50% of award-winning bars, industry-leading cafes and a number of wineries choose Impos’ point of sale system to help manage their busy venues.

title: Jonas Software Acquires Pacsoft International Ltd.
content:
South Brisbane, October 1, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Pacsoft International Ltd. Headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand’s ‘City of Sails’, Pacsoft is best known for its PacsoftNG marina management software used by marina, boatyard and shipyard managers to operate and manage their facilities.

Mike Henton, Jonas Software Australia and New Zealand Portfolio Manager said he was delighted to announce the acquisition at a time where boating is growing in popularity. “We’re thrilled to bring Pacsoft into the fold and are committed to its continued success. With the 2021 America’s Cup on the horizon and enthusiasm for boating on the rise, Pacsoft is well placed to capitalize on these opportunities.”

Pacsoft Chief Executive Chris Thomas said the acquisition would provide his team with increased business skills, greater financial resources and access to new technology. Mr.Thomas has managed the company since 1997, and he and existing Pacsoft staff will remain in place as part of the deal.

“Jonas Software knows what it takes to grow a business globally,” Mr. Thomas said. “This acquisition gives us the strength, expertise and security to deliver the world’s leading marina and boatyard management software globally long into the future.”

PacsoftNG makes it simple for marina, boatyard, and shipyard managers to efficiently run all aspects of their business, including operations, administration, accounting, management and business analysis.

About Pacsoft International Ltd.

Pacsoft is a New Zealand-based company with 20 years of experience providing software for marinas, boatyards and shipyards. Marine businesses in more than 20 countries use its one-stop shop marina management software to run all aspects of their business. The PacsoftNG platform is designed to save businesses time and money by automating and integrating daily tasks and helping marinas, boatyards and shipyards to serve customers while maintaining tight control over business processes.

title: Jonas Software Acquires GuestVision Technology Solutions
content:
Markham, Ontario, August 23, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of GuestVision Technology Solutions from DB Builder, Inc. Proven to be reliable and easy to use, GuestVision continues to be a recognized leader in enterprise software solutions within the beauty/cosmetology industry.

“We are very excited to continue to invest in the beauty industry as this is our fifth acquisition in the past few years,” explains Jeff McKee, Group CEO of Jonas Australia & New Zealand. “GuestVision has been a market leader and successful software company in the Cosmetology industry as well as within the Salon Chain market. We are pleased to welcome them to the Jonas family.”

Founder and CEO Ted Therriault says, “Jonas Software brings industry expertise with an emphasis on growth that will enhance our ability to deliver innovative solutions for our clients and their customers. Jonas’s mission and values align with our strategic vision and goals, our belief to provide optimal customer service and take care of our employees.”

About GuestVision Technology Solutions

GuestVision Software was released into the marketplace, initially to the walk-in beauty salon chain market. Today, GuestVision is one of a few salon software packages flexible enough to span the breadth of the beauty industry with a focus on multi-national enterprises across cosmetology schools, salons, and barbershops. Today GuestVision offers not only software solutions but hardware, support, and consulting for an all-in-one stop for technology needs. GuestVision promises to continue providing innovation, exceptional service, and new technology to assist clients in all of their endeavours.

About Jonas Software

Jonas Software operates over 80 independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. From its roots formed in the construction and club management markets, Jonas Software’s reach has grown extensively within the salon/spa, fitness, membership, hospitality, and industrial verticals. Today, Jonas Software is proud to supply industry-leading enterprise management software and related services to more than 80,000 customers in 20 vertical markets.

title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of ITWERCS Point of Sale
content:
Markham, Ontario, August 6, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Point of Sale Enterprise, LLC (“ITWERCS”). ITWERCS provides world-class cloud-based enterprise software for restaurants.

“We are thrilled to welcome the ITWERCS team into the Jonas family,” says Matt Otchet, Portfolio CEO at Jonas. “ITWERCS adds a tremendous platform to our growing POS portfolio. They have developed cutting edge technology serving the needs of food and beverage professionals in a multitude of business environments from quick serve to fine dining.”

CEO Chris Duncan had this to say, “We are eager to work with Jonas to continue building on and growing the ITWERCS business.  Myself and our employees have already been impressed with what we’ve seen so far, and are excited to realize the opportunities that are possible with Jonas’ backing and resources.”

About ITWERCS

ITWERCS was founded in 2016 in Marietta, Georgia, USA.  Their cloud platform was originally launched in 2007 inside a major restaurant brand and provides a robust and comprehensive solution that covers POS, payments, kitchen display systems, scheduling, inventory, marketing & loyalty, and waitlist & reservations.

title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of CORVID Paygate
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, June 24, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of CORVID Paygate (“paygate) from Ultra Electronics Holdings plc (“Ultra”). Paygate is a payment processing software business that provides data validation and services to support automated banking and e-commerce transactions.

“The acquisition of CORVID Paygate reflects our ongoing commitment to acquiring complementary payment technologies with synergies across Jonas UK and Europe,” says Scott Saklad, Group CEO of Jonas UK and Europe. “It is a great opportunity to acquire a premium payment processing software provider that helps customers efficiently manage their cash flow, reduce costs and deal with emerging industry standards and regulations. We are excited to welcome the Paygate customers and employees to the Jonas family of businesses.”

Simon Pryce, CEO of Ultra, says, “Jonas is the perfect home for Paygate as they continue to grow and expand their payment processing portfolio. Paygate has some excellent technology, but has little in common with the rest of the Group, and has better growth prospects with an owner who has specific interests and capability in developing payments processing and software. We’d like to thank our CORVID Paygate employees for their contribution to Ultra and wish them and the business the very best of success under their new ownership.”

About Paygate 

Paygate was founded in 2016 in Stevenage, Hertfordshire, United Kingdom, Paygate is a premium payment processing software business that provides data validation and services to support automated banking and e-commerce transactions. Paygate is built to take on new and emerging industry standards and regulations such as PSD2, SHA2 and NPA. Paygate provide free software updates to ensure our customers stay compliant and their payments schedules stay on track.

About Ultra

Ultra is a specialist international electrical and electronics engineering company. The Group operates predominantly in defence and other highly regulated markets with particular expertise in the maritime, and C3 (command, communication, and control including cyber) domains. Ultra is a Tier 3 equipment/sub-system and Tier 2 systems provider, focused on providing mission-specific, bespoke solutions for its customers.

About Jonas Software

Jonas Software operates over 80 independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. Today, Jonas Software is proud to supply industry-leading enterprise management software and related services to more than 80,000 customers in 20 vertical markets.

title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of BEC Legal Systems
content:
Markham, Ontario, April 16, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of BEC Legal Systems (“BEC”). BEC develops enterprise solutions to help law firms organize and streamline their day-to-day tasks and cases.

“We are very excited to acquire BEC, a recognizable leader and pioneer in the legal software vertical,” says Matt Otchet, Group CEO at Jonas. “BEC has done a remarkable job in growing into the success it is today, and we look forward to collaborating with the BEC team to further build upon that foundation.  The entire team is dedicated to providing winning products supported with world-class service, and I believe that there will be a lot of opportunities to expand even further.  Please join me in welcoming the BEC team and customers to the Jonas family.”

BEC CEO John Brookbank had this to say, “We are thrilled to join the Jonas Group and eager to work with them as we take our software to the next level.  With the infusion of Jonas resources and backing, we’re confident in our ability to expand services and innovate our product offerings.  Our family business has grown over the years because we’ve listened to our customers and worked to address their ever-changing needs.  It was clear from the beginning that Jonas shares our belief that personal service is the cornerstone of success.”

About BEC

BEC Legal Systems was founded in 1942 in Cincinnati, OH, USA, starting out as a vendor of typewriters and re-furbished office equipment.  In 1970 the company began to focus exclusively on the legal market, providing network services, training and consulting for document management, document automation, time and billing, and digital dictation systems. Today, BEC continues to develop software solutions that help law firms organize their cases, manage their dockets and efficiently produce documents, giving attorneys more time to focus on their clients. 

About Jonas Software

Jonas Software operates over 80 independently managed software brands around the world, providing them with the strategic guidance and financial security required to be leaders in their respective markets. From its roots formed in the construction and club management markets, Jonas Software’s reach has grown extensively within the fitness, membership, hospitality and industrial verticals. title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of mJobTime Corporation
content:
Markham, Ontario, April 8, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of mJobTime Corporation (“mJobTime”). mJobTime delivers sophisticated time tracking software that is easy to use for businesses of all sizes.

Steve Cowan, President of the Jonas Construction Group, had this to say, “The acquisition of mJobTime further establishes Jonas as a global leader in the construction vertical. mJobTime’s time tracking software enables businesses to improve managing and tracking their field resources and streamlines control and processes, which in turn helps businesses save time and money. We are excited to welcome the team at mJobTime to the Jonas Construction Group as we work together to grow their business and help them achieve their professional milestones.”

“Jonas is the perfect partner to help us expand the business as we enter a new chapter in mJobTime’s journey. Jonas truly understands the needs and demands of the customers and are constantly researching and developing innovative solutions to cater to them,” says President of mJobTime Corporation Mike Soniat. “We look forward to working with the team at Jonas to continue to build upon our success and our products in order to better serve our customers.”

About mJobTime

Founded in 1994 and headquartered in Beaumont, TX, USA, mJobTime provides customizable, scalable time-tracking software to help businesses improve on their processes and efficiencies while decreasing their costs and expenses. mJobTime has received many accolades including being named one of the 50 Hottest Companies by Construtech Magazine, and more recently, being named the Technology Enabler for Construtech Vision award winner, Heico Construction Group.

title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of WineFetch, Inc.
content:
Markham, Ontario, March 15, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of WineFetch, Inc. (“WineFetch”). WineFetch provides cutting-edge e-commerce websites and apps for wine and spirit stores that are easy for both retailers and customers to integrate and use.

Matt Otchet, Group CEO of the Foodservice, Construction, Continuing Education & Retail Wine and Spirits POS Group had this to say, “We are very excited with the acquisition of WineFetch, a respected leader in the Wine and Spirits market. Their team has done an exceptional job building a solution that caters to the needs of each client, helping them grow their business and increase their online presence and sales. WineFetch is the perfect complement to our growing Wine and Spirits portfolio, further establishing Jonas as a leader in this vertical. Again, we welcome the WineFetch team and their customers to the Jonas family and we cannot wait to work and grow together!” 

“We are eager to be a part of the team at Jonas and see how we can collaborate to grow, better serve our customers and add value to the current Jonas brand customers in the Wine and Spirits vertical who are not currently using WineFetch,” said Founder Steven Goodman. “Jonas provides the team at WineFetch the means and stability to develop our product while expanding the business to new customers all over the world. We look forward to working with the Jonas team and reaching new horizons.”

About WineFetch 

Founded in 2004 and based in Chapel Hill, NC, USA, WineFetch helps transform traditional brick and mortar wine retailers into savvy online businesses with powerful, data-driven marketing, SEO, and e-commerce tools that increase customer acquisition, retention, and loyalty, resulting in higher sales. WineFetch’s user experience and the interface makes it easy for clients and their customers to use. WineFetch also captures customer data to help retailers better understand their customers and proactively cater to their needs and wants.

title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of Green 4 Solutions Ltd.
content:
Wallingford, Oxfordshire, March 11, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Green 4 Solutions Ltd. (“Green 4”), a leading provider of CRM, ticketing and data-driven marketing solutions to both the sport and recreational leisure sectors. 

“The acquisition of Green 4 further drives Jonas forwards as a leader in the recreational leisure space and opens up new opportunities within the UK and Global sports sectors” says Scott Saklad, Group CEO of Jonas UK. “Green 4’s enterprise software provides Sports and Leisure organisations with a range of tools to help to improve engagement with fans and visitors, gather customer insight and use data to drive retention and increase revenues. The team at Green 4 are experts in their field, and we are very excited to work with them and help them to continue to deepen their solution and achieve their business goals.”

Peter Oliver, Founder and Managing Director of Green 4 had this to say, “Jonas has a wealth of experience and success operating software companies serving the fitness and leisure markets. They know how to grow a business at each phase of a company’s lifecycle and we are excited to join the Jonas family in order to extend our solution and develop our business for the betterment of our staff and customers.”

About Green 4 Solutions Ltd.

Green 4 was founded at the Ricoh Arena, Coventry in 2006 before moving to their current home in Lutterworth, Leicestershire. Green 4 specialises in providing sports and leisure businesses with a CRM driven approach to ticketing and customer engagement. Built on Microsoft Dynamics CRM, “Go” is a single platform solution that helps organisations create fantastic relationships with their customers through carefully constructed online journeys and the intelligent use of data. Green 4 provides solutions to; Silverstone Circuit, Hollywood Bowl Group, Chill Factore, Aston Villa FC, Celtic FC, Club Atlético River Plate and other well-recognised brands globally.

title: Jonas Software Announces the Acquisition of Happen Business Pty Limited
content:
South Brisbane, February 13, 2019 – Jonas Software (“Jonas”) is pleased to announce the acquisition of Happen Business Pty Limited. (“Happen”). With its sophisticated Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) accounting software, Jim2, Happen delivers complete business management software solutions to an extensive regional and international customer base.

“Happen has established and expanded its business and products over the past 19 years to become an international market leader in its field,” explains Jeff McKee, Group CEO of Jonas Australia & New Zealand.  “Happen has focused on delivering premium customer-centric service and software solutions that have a proven track record in streamlining business efficacy and successfully delivering client solutions.  We are pleased to welcome them to the Jonas family”. 

“We are very proud of the company we have built with Happen, and this joining is an exciting opportunity for us to fuel transformation and growth within our company,” said Happen Managing Director and founder, Paul Berger.  “Jonas Software brings bold, fresh thinking combined with business and industry expertise that will enhance our ability to deliver innovative solutions for our clients and their customers. It is the perfect partnership to help us take Happen and Jim2 to new heights.”

About Happen Business Pty Limited 

Happen was founded in 2001 in Mortdale, New South Wales, Australia. Happen was established to fill a growing need in the market for a comprehensive accounting and business workflow solution. The company rapidly established a strong following for its Jim2 Business Engine software, and now has an extensive customer base in diverse industries such as managed print, managed services, importing, distribution, sales and service, specialized retailing and manufacturing. Happen’s in-house team of professional consultants, development experts and support engineers are ready and resourced to ensure businesses using Jim2 Business Engine maximize their return on investment.
